alert.note: Alert for Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wakulla, Gadsden, central Liberty and southwestern Leon Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Greensboro to 17 miles east of Stonemill Creek. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Gretna, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Juniper, Douglas City, Vilas, Hosford, Jensen Place, Rosedale, Central City, Clio, Santa Clara, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Quincy Airport, Lowry and Wetumpka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
